history.content: Resolved. Thanks so much to the CS advisors for their help.

I am a declared simultaneous major in Business and L&S CS. I want to drop a class but have used both of my late drops. 

When I say I have used both of my late drops, I mean that L&S has capped me at 2 late drops. Haas, however, allows for drops on a case-by-case basis. I have been approved by Haas to drop my 3rd class, and am blocked by L&S.

My question is,

1) Is it possible to "drop" L&S CS as a major, effectively putting me solely in Haas only (single major) so that I can drop courses? I would no longer be constrained by L&S drop rules in this case.

2) If I do so, how quickly would this "drop" be completed on CalCentral as the deadline (December 3rd) is coming up for late drops? 

3) Can I "re-declare" L&S CS the following semester? The reason why I ask is because I want to graduate in both CS & Business (simultaneous degree).

Essentially, I want to drop classes but I can't because I used my L&S late drops. But if I can just be a Business major then the business school allows me to drop my classes. I want to eventually graduate as a sim. major in CS & Business.

Thank you very much in advance!
history.subject: Drop Sim Major?
